item.title: Palantir和戴尔跻身S&P 500新榜单，指数再获平衡
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.、戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc）和伊利赔偿公司（Erie Indemnity Co.【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc., Dell Technologies Inc. and Erie Indemnity Co. are set to join the S&P 500 as part of its latest quarterly weighting change.】

item.title: 惠誉上调土耳其评级至 BB-
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）今年第二次上调了土耳其的信用评级，这是该公司对土耳其继续实施降低通胀的主流政策充满信心的最新迹象。【原文：Fitch Ratings upgraded Turkey’s credit rating for a second time this year, in the latest sign it’s confident in the continuation of mainstream policies to bring down inflation.】

item.title: Big Lots 准备申请破产，计划出售门店
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，折扣家居用品零售商 Big Lots 公司正准备最快于周日申请破产，并计划通过法院监督程序出售其连锁店。【原文：Discount home goods retailer Big Lots Inc. is preparing to file for bankruptcy as soon as Sunday, and plans to sell its chain of stores via a court-supervised process, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 华尔街交易员突然一致认为未来经济危险重重
item.description: 对于华尔街那些坚守经济牛市的人来说，日子越来越难过了。【原文：For those on Wall Street clinging to the bull case on the economy, life is getting harder.】

item.title: 对冲基金将石油反弹的赌注降至历史最低点
item.description: 在供应膨胀和需求减弱的前景下，对冲基金对原油的看涨程度成为 13 年多来最低。【原文：Hedge funds turned the least bullish on crude in records going back more than 13 years on the prospect of swelling supplies and waning demand.】

item.title: Subway 在 23.4 亿美元的交易中增加了特许经营债务堆
item.description: Subway 出售了 23.4 亿美元的证券，这是该三明治连锁店在短短三个月内出售的第二笔由包括特许经营权在内的资产支持的交易，因为该公司在美国可能降息之前对收购债务进行了再融资。【原文：Subway has sold $2.34 billion in securities, the sandwich chain’s second deal backed by assets including franchises in barely three months, as the company refinances buyout debt ahead of likely US interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 拜登助手正在起草美国主权财富基金提案
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，乔-拜登总统的高级助手一直在酝酿一项建立主权财富基金的提案，该基金将允许美国投资于国家安全利益，包括技术、能源和供应链中的关键环节。【原文：Top aides to President Joe Biden have been crafting a proposal to create a sovereign wealth fund that would allow the US to invest in national security interests including technology, energy, and critical links in the supply chain, according to a person familiar with the effort.】

item.title: 巴尼耶是法国摆脱债务约束的新希望
item.description: 米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）执掌法国经济几乎是一项不可能完成的任务：既要遵守财政纪律，又要在巨大的政治压力下反其道而行之。【原文：Michel Barnier is taking the reins of the French economy with a near impossible task: Reconcile the need for fiscal discipline with overwhelming political pressure to do the opposite.】

item.title: 最新就业数据未能解决美联储关于九月减息的争论
item.description: 美国劳动力市场的最新情况为美联储开始大幅降息提供了可能性，尽管两位主要官员周五并未在本月的会议上支持这一举措。【原文：The latest snapshot of the US labor market left open the possibility the Federal Reserve will go big as it begins cutting interest rates, though two key officials on Friday stopped short of endorsing such a move at their meeting this month.】

item.title: 邦德曼的 Wildcat 成立新对冲基金，投资 2 亿美元
item.description: 野猫资本管理公司（Wildcat Capital Management）是亿万富翁大卫-邦德曼（David Bonderman）的家族办公室，该公司已向白鲨投资公司（Whitebark Investors）投资了 2 亿多美元。【原文：Wildcat Capital Management, founded as the family office of billionaire David Bonderman, has invested more than $200 million with Whitebark Investors, a hedge fund led by Thomas McConnon that was spun out of Wildcat.】

item.title: 法国总统巴尼耶表示将调整马克龙的经济政策
item.description: 法国新任命的总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）表示，他愿意对总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）的经济政策略作修改，但这些修改不得影响遏制公共债务上升的努力。【原文：France’s newly appointed prime minister, Michel Barnier, indicated he’s willing to make minor changes to President Emmanuel Macron’s economic policies that don’t compromise efforts to curb rising public debt.】

item.title: 美国警告俄罗斯干预大选的程度和范围广泛
item.description: 一位美国情报官员说，俄罗斯影响美国大选的努力比过去几个周期更为复杂，他警告说，俄罗斯的活动远远超出了司法部本周起诉书中披露的所谓阴谋。【原文：Russia’s efforts to influence the US election are more sophisticated than in past cycles, a US intelligence official said, warning the country’s activities go well beyond an alleged plot revealed in a Justice Department indictment this week.】

item.title: 切尔西俱乐部支持者 Clearlake 和 Todd Boehly 权衡所有权选择
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，切尔西俱乐部的主要股东在执掌这家英超足球俱乐部两年多之后，由于双方关系恶化，正在探讨他们对俱乐部的所有权问题。【原文：Chelsea FC’s main shareholders are exploring their ownership of the English Premier League football club after little more than two years in charge, amid a deterioration in relations, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 罗伯-阿诺特的第一只 ETF 专为购买（指数）输家而设计
item.description:
这是一种价值投资

。【原文：

It’s a form of value investing

】

item.title: Esmark 公司前首席执行官就美国钢铁公司收购要约失败与美国证券交易委员会达成和解
item.description: Esmark 公司及其前首席执行官已就美国证券交易委员会提出的指控达成和解，因为他们公开宣布收购美国钢铁公司，但却没有足够的财力支持这一收购。【原文：Esmark Inc. and its former chief executive officer have settled charges brought on by the US Securities and Exchange Commission for publicly announcing an offer to buy United States Steel Corp. without having the financial means to back the bid.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司加快化肥计划，计划投资 8 亿美元建厂
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，随着巴西农业部门的蓬勃发展，巴西国有石油巨头巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）正在加快重新进入化肥行业的计划。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil giant Petroleo Brasileiro SA is accelerating a plan to re-enter the fertilizer industry as the country’s agricultural sector booms, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达本周暴跌 4000 亿美元让比特币看起来很平静
item.description: 本周，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的市值缩水超过 4000 亿美元，对主要股票基准造成了压力，因为对美国经济健康状况和人工智能贸易的担忧正在蔓延。【原文：Nvidia Corp. has wiped out more than $400 billion in value this week, weighing on key equity benchmarks as jitters spread over the health of the US economy and an AI trade that may have gotten ahead of itself.】

item.title: 尼日利亚颁发首张许可证以建造延期的浮式液化天然气厂
item.description: 尼日利亚的UTM Offshore Ltd.已获准建造这个西非国家有史以来第一个浮式液化天然气设施—；这一消息首次公布已有五年之久。【原文：Nigeria’s UTM Offshore Ltd. has received approval to build the West African nation’s first-ever floating liquefied natural gas facility — five years after it was first announced.】

item.title: 豆油因加拿大油菜籽竞争困境而延续跌势
item.description: 大豆油期货跌至两周低点，原因是大宗商品市场的大范围抛售加剧了加拿大菜籽油向美国供应增加的忧虑。【原文：Soybean oil futures slumped to a two-week low as a broader selloff in commodity markets added to woes about increased supplies of Canadian rapeseed oil into the US.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州繁荣小镇借贷 6500 万美元帮助修复爆满的监狱
item.description: 佛罗里达州坦帕北部的一个县是美国发展最快的县之一，大量新居民的涌入带来了一个问题：当地的监狱快爆满了。【原文：The county just north of Tampa, Florida, is one of the fastest growing in the US and the influx of new residents is causing a problem — its local jail is bursting.】

item.title: 奇货通讯若隐若现的成熟墙
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称 Chewy 股价可能因盈利前景而翻番
item.description: 摩根士丹利称，随着宠物用品零售商采取措施提高盈利能力，Chewy Inc.【原文：Chewy Inc. shares could surge roughly 100% in the next 12 months as the pet supplies retailer takes measures to improve profitability, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 英国新规在即，支付公司继续打击欺诈退款行为
item.description: 尽管监管机构本周做出了重大转变，但英国支付行业仍在争取修改欺诈补偿规则，而距离规则颁布仅有一个月的时间。【原文：The UK payments industry is still fighting for changes to fraud-reimbursement rules with just a month to go before they’re enacted, even after a significant U-turn by regulators this week.】

item.title: 有一种非投机性加密货币使用案例正在兴起
item.description:
稳定币是真正的加密货币杀手级应用吗？【原文：

Are stablecoins the real crypto killer app?

】

item.title: 随着套利交易时代的结束，Amundi 预计日元将进一步走高
item.description: Amundi SA 首席策略师表示，随着使用日币进行的套利交易继续收尾，日元还有继续走高的空间。【原文：The yen has scope to extend its advance as carry trades using the Japanese currency continue to wind down, according to Amundi SA’s chief strategist.】

item.title: 安哥拉将出售最大保险公司股份，公司将于10月上市
item.description: 安哥拉将出售其最大保险公司的股份，因为这个南部非洲国家正在加快资产出售计划，以增强其财政实力。【原文：Angola will sell shares in its biggest insurer as the southern African nation accelerates its asset-sale plans to bolster its finances.】

item.title: 阿姆斯特朗的司法改革为何令投资者心惊肉跳？
item.description: 即将卸任的总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）又一次颠覆了墨西哥的政治格局，因为该国即将通过一项有争议的改革，这项改革将深刻改变该国的司法机构。【原文：Outgoing President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador is upending Mexico’s political landscape one more time, as the country inches closer to passing a controversial reform that would deeply transform the country’s judiciary.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利因出售第一共和国股票被罚 200 万美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利被马萨诸塞州监管机构罚款 200 万美元，原因是 First Republic 的一名高管在去年加利福尼亚州贷款公司倒闭前的几个月内出售股票。【原文：Morgan Stanley was fined $2 million by a Massachusetts regulator over stock sales by a First Republic executive in the months leading up to the California lender’s collapse last year.】

item.title: 需求减少，沙特下调 10 月亚洲原油价格
item.description: 由于对需求减弱的担忧日益加剧，沙特阿拉伯下调了其主要亚洲市场旗舰原油等级的定价。【原文：Saudi Arabia cut pricing of its flagship crude grade for its main market in Asia next month as concerns mount over waning demand.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请荷兰国际集团的马尼巴尔多领导德国消费银行业务
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）聘请丹尼尔-拉诺-马尼巴尔多（Daniel Llano Manibardo）担任德国消费者银行业务主管，这家华尔街公司正在推进在欧洲最大经济体扩张的计划。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. hired Daniel Llano Manibardo as head of consumer banking for Germany, as the Wall Street firms pushes ahead with plans to expand in Europe’s largest economy.】
